name: The Sacrificial
description:
The Sacrificial is game for mobile platforms but we will  redesign later for a now just playable on windows 

In the game you are a Sheperd and this Sheperd's ancestor betray to the GODs 

Then the Gods are ask the shepherd to sacrifice his Sheep in return The GODs won't do anything to Shepherd's race anymore.

you can download if you want from Google Drive: Game Folder
